name: projects/1017425675889/locations/europe-west3/instances/a099fd02-80fc-4a0f-a80c-fb5d7fe78564/rules/ru_a773ac0a-8ee3-40c9-bfce-00781d71ec1a
text:
rule Audit_Log_Cleared {
  

  meta:
    
    author = "TCS Cloud MDR COE team"
    description = "Audit_Log_Cleared"
    severity = "High"
    type = "alert"
    mitre_attack_tactic = "Defense Evasion"
    mitre_attack_technique = "File Deletion"


  events:
    $e.metadata.event_type = "USER_CREATION"
    $e.metadata.product_event_type= "1102" or $e.metadata.product_event_type= "1104" or $e.metadata.product_event_type= "517" or $e.metadata.product_event_type= "104"

  outcome:
   
    $risk_score = 60

  condition:
    $e
}
author: TCS Cloud MDR COE team
